attributes.action: Continue to not give Ringo Starr a Knighthhood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I urge the Prime Minister to continue with the policy of not giving the Curmudgeonly ex Beatle a Knighthood.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
